sources.title: Lucky Pigs (1939)
sources.description: A down-and-out family of pigs wins a sweepstakes, are immediately besieged by reporters and photographers, and then go on a wild spending spree, which soon exhausts their windfall-prize money. Than the tax collector shows up. After paying the taxes, the pigs are right back where they started from. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/lucky-pigs-1939/

metadata.Plot: A down-and-out family of pigs wins a sweepstakes, are immediately besieged by reporters and photographers, and then go on a wild spending spree, which soon exhausts their windfall-prize money. Than the tax collector shows up. After paying the taxes, the pigs are right back where they started from.
metadata.Actors: Elvia Allman, Sara Berner, Dave Webber
